segments.text: I'm just standing here, watching this kitchen scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that strikes me is the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the front edge in a steady sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming quite a large puddle on the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman drying the plate hasn't noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is literally in the water, yet her expression is completely neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so absorbed in that dish?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the children behind her, and my heart skips a beat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s tilted, and its legs are splayed out awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up too, eagerly anticipating a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so worried that stool is going to tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation just feels like an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a miracle nothing has gone terribly wrong yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
